item.description:
Hello Everyone,

Time for some exiting outdoor activities as the weather is getting a lot nicer!!! Come join us for a fun GO CART racing day at F1_OUTDOORS. Be ready to get some of your inner competitiveness out with this event. We are planning to book a Min Grand Prix package that will cost $81/person. This includes everything ( a day license, race suit & helmet, racing time, and $1 meetup fee.) It is a bit pricey but it should be a really fun and high adrenaline activity to kick off your summer.

We need to make the reservation at least a week and a half in advance and pay in full. Therefore, if you are interested, please RSVP to the meetup group and send me the $81 check by Tuesday, June 9th. Your money will be returned to you if we have to cancel it due to bad weather.

Please Mail the check to:
Ngoc Tran
7 Lakeview Ave. Apt 1
Reading, MA 01867

Or Through Paypal:
nmt7c@virginia.edu

Check out the information below:

COST: $81
WHEN: Sunday, June 21
TIME: morning/afternoon : TBD
LOCATION: F1 Outdoors — 798 North Bedford Street, (Rt. 18)
East Bridgewater, MA 02333
Main Number: 508.350.1000

Organizers: Tran & Warren

F1’S WEBSITE:
http://www.f1outdoors...

Any questions?
Contact Warren: changw1_2000@yahoo.com
Tran : tran_arch@yahoo.com

group.name: The Greater Boston Asian Professionals Meetup Group

item.name: F1 Go Cart Racing!!!
